name: Brain Life
tagline: Portal of services for a Brain's life
body:
### This portal hosts a series of projects to support computational neuroscience research.

### Designer Templates
Weâ€™ve crafted some handsome templates for you to use. Go ahead and click 'Continue to layouts' to browse through them. You can easily go back to edit your page before publishing. After publishing your page, you can revisit the page generator and switch to another theme. Your Page content will be preserved.

### Authors and Contributors
2016 Franco Pestilli (@francopestilli) and Soichi Hayashi (@soichih) Indiana University.

### Support provided by the [National Science Foundation](https://www.nsf.gov/awardsearch/showAward?AWD_ID=1636893).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
